ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The work was supported by National Natural Science Foundation of China (NSFC, 31872322), the Fundamental Research Funds for the Central Universities (2662017PY030), National R&D Project of Transgenic Animals of Ministry of Science and Technology of China (2016ZX08006-003) and National high technology research and development plan (863, 2011AA100302).
